nodes.html:
Admin Portal

eProduct. Organize. Manage. Maintain

Management portal for IT administrator to control and maintain the smoothness of Appvity eProducts. System Automation, Permission, Analytics, and Performance management are the crucial elements for system management. All can be found in Appvity Admin Portal!

Covering crucial aspects of MS Teams

Centralize essential elements within MS Teams for a better overview. The IT administrator can focus on the statistics on Teams and channels, the security, and storage to maintain the system which runs smoothly and can be controlled easily.

System alerts from Appvity Back-End

Keep updated with system Back-End in a quick glance. Admin Portal gathers all information about #PowerAutomate workflow, service jobs, and background process of all eProducts to ensure the best usability. Sending alerts rapidly helps maintain good control of the entire system, so the administrator can verify and troubleshoot the errors easily

Gathering eProducts information from anywhere for a quick glance

Analyze the entire system through charts and reports to keep everything smooth and secure. In addition, keeping track of the performance is very crucial as it can stabilize the continuous of system. So, the administrator can have a quick response to maintain the usability.

Built-in tools for additional system maintenance

Coming soon...

frontmatter.title: Teams and Channels
frontmatter.description: Centralize every Team and Channel that is using eProducts as a tab in a single view for management.

frontmatter.title: Tools
frontmatter.description: Support tools and scripts that can be used to maintain the system.

frontmatter.title: Analytics and Reports
frontmatter.description: Showing analytics and reports quickly to ensure the usage of the system is table.

frontmatter.title: Permission and Users
frontmatter.description: Maintain security across the tenant to provide boundaries and ensure data protection.

frontmatter.title: Workflows
frontmatter.description: Manage all the workflows being used in the Appvity eProducts to provide the process reliability.

frontmatter.title: System Announcement
frontmatter.description: Send fatal errors from back-end or notify users across the tenant to keep the daily work steady.

frontmatter.title: API Key Management
frontmatter.description: Manage API keys that gain access to the data for security.

frontmatter.title: Service Jobs
frontmatter.description: Centralize service jobs across the tenant for better view and make sure the stability of the system.

frontmatter.title: Files
frontmatter.description: Centralize files being used in Appvity eProducts to ensure the management and the space availability in Azure cloud/MS Teams.

frontmatter.title: Performance
frontmatter.description: Showing system state across the tenant to maintain the smoothness and stability of the system.

frontmatter.title: Audit logs
frontmatter.description: Allows you to track user/system’s actions.

frontmatter.title: Overview
frontmatter.description: Entire Appvity eTask system view in a single frame including projects, sources, and statistics.

frontmatter.title: External Sources
frontmatter.description: Manage all external sources of eTask across the tenant to ensure the security and control source.

frontmatter.title: Projects
frontmatter.description: Manage all projects status in a single view.

frontmatter.title: Tickets
frontmatter.description: Manage statistics of tickets in the entire system.

frontmatter.title: Overview
frontmatter.description: Whole Appvity eHelpdesk system view in a single frame including customers, tickets, and statistics.

frontmatter.title: Accounts
frontmatter.description: Manage customers to improve the system overall.

nodes.html: Appvity Admin Portal will gather all the Power Automate workflows that are being used in eProducts and display them in a single view. Provide an effortless feature for administrator to manage system workflow, keep track of business process and maintain the smoothness of system automation. Administrator can have an overview of eProducts workflows status and ensure the reliability of the system with users and can have a quick performance analysis for the entire system.

frontmatter.title: Manage Power Automate workflow across the tenant

nodes.html: Admin Portal consists of all system notification in one single view which can help administrator to troubleshoot, maintain, and manage alerts for the entire system. Appvity Admin Portal consolidates notification from emails, services, and activities across the eProducts system. It helps improve management, system reliability, and reduce administrator’s effort.
